name: Cyberpunk Runner (GHOST845)
description:
Cyberpunk Runner About

Cyberpunk Runner is a side scrolling infinite runner game with a Cyberpunk theme. Your goal is to stop the incoming invasion of drones by taking them head on and destroying them. But if you get hit once, its Game Over!

Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Retun - Shoots
  • Space - Jumps
